title: Keep losing ranked games becuse players just give up or troll
body:
I can't play leave silver becuse in every single game at least 1 or more players left the game when it starts or they just don't know what ranked actually is. The game just start and we try win the game but there is a loot of problems becuse players just don't know how to focus/warning other players (ss or pings)/don't help us or came in teamfights. I don't know what to do anymore. I'm keep trying to play ranked like before.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body:
Honestly dude

Its end of season. As a rule of thumb more players are on edge trying to get Gold or whatever rank they feel they deserve. It also makes it prime time for elo trolls who don't want you to advance. Its prime time for players to check and see you're in promos, then camp you.

If thats not bad enough, its the end of runes and masteries. That means for anyone who ever thought of an off meta build now's the time to try it. 

Hit that perma mute and pray during your matchmaking. Spam those meta champs and focus cs/objectives.
nah bronze is really easy to get out of. just split push all day and they wont will be too busy not knowing what they are doing to stop it

Your best bet is to duo, 2 people that got eachothers back is better than having a bunch of wildcard misfits that can be unreliable,afk,feed,troll,tilt,tax,lag,noob but wants to be carried,repeat the same mistakes insanity like, that is if you can get past the rampaging  chaos of end seasons with smurfs destroying those solo q low players as they keep flooding the losses while on the edge.
